query: We are a group of 5 looking for a 7-day travel itinerary, departing from Sault Ste. Marie towards Michigan. We plan to visit 3 different cities from March 15th to March 21st, 2022. Our budget allows us to spend up to $12,700. We require entire rooms for our stay. Could you help us with this plan?
